metadata.title: Lines and Angles for Kids
metadata.description: Interactive questions to build understanding of basic geometry concepts
metadata.author: Math Educator

questions.question: Which of these represents a point?
questions.svg_content: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 100'> <circle cx='50' cy='50' r='3' fill='red'/> <line x1='100' y1='30' x2='100' y2='70' stroke='blue' stroke-width='2'/> <rect x='150' y='30' width='40' height='40' fill='pink' stroke='black'/></svg>
questions.explanation: The small black dot on the left is how we represent a point.

questions.question: Which figure shows a line segment?
questions.svg_content: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 100'><defs><marker id='arrow' viewBox='0 0 10 10' refX='5' refY='5' markerWidth='6' markerHeight='6' orient='auto-start-reverse'><path d='M 0 0 L 10 5 L 0 10 z' fill='LightSkyBlue'></path></marker><marker id='dot' markerWidth='5' markerHeight='5' refX='2.5' refY='2.5' orient='auto'><circle cx='2.5' cy='2.5' r='2.5' fill='LightSkyBlue'></circle></marker></defs><line x1='70' y1='30' x2='70' y2='70' stroke-width='2' marker-end='url(#dot)' marker-start='url(#dot)' stroke='LightSkyBlue' ></line><line x1='100' y1='30' x2='100' y2='70' stroke-width='2' marker-end='url(#arrow)' marker-start='url(#dot)' stroke='LightSkyBlue' ></line><line x1='130' y1='30' x2='130' y2='70' stroke-width='2' marker-end='url(#arrow)' marker-start='url(#arrow)' stroke='LightSkyBlue' ></line></svg>
questions.explanation: The first figure shows a line segment between two points.

questions.question: Which figure represents a line?
questions.svg_content: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 100'><defs><marker id='arrow' viewBox='0 0 10 10' refX='5' refY='5' markerWidth='6' markerHeight='6' orient='auto-start-reverse'><path d='M 0 0 L 10 5 L 0 10 z' fill='LightSkyBlue'></path></marker><marker id='dot' markerWidth='5' markerHeight='5' refX='2.5' refY='2.5' orient='auto'><circle cx='2.5' cy='2.5' r='2.5' fill='LightSkyBlue'></circle></marker></defs><line x1='70' y1='30' x2='70' y2='70' stroke-width='2' marker-end='url(#dot)' marker-start='url(#dot)' stroke='LightSkyBlue' ></line><line x1='100' y1='30' x2='100' y2='70' stroke-width='2' marker-end='url(#arrow)' marker-start='url(#dot)' stroke='LightSkyBlue' ></line><line x1='130' y1='30' x2='130' y2='70' stroke-width='2' marker-end='url(#arrow)' marker-start='url(#arrow)' stroke='LightSkyBlue' ></line></svg>
questions.explanation: The figure with arrows at both ends represents a line extending infinitely.

questions.question: Which figure shows a ray?
questions.svg_content: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 100'><defs><marker id='arrow' viewBox='0 0 10 10' refX='5' refY='5' markerWidth='6' markerHeight='6' orient='auto-start-reverse'><path d='M 0 0 L 10 5 L 0 10 z' fill='LightSkyBlue'></path></marker><marker id='dot' markerWidth='5' markerHeight='5' refX='2.5' refY='2.5' orient='auto'><circle cx='2.5' cy='2.5' r='2.5' fill='LightSkyBlue'></circle></marker></defs><line x1='70' y1='30' x2='70' y2='70' stroke-width='2' marker-end='url(#dot)' marker-start='url(#dot)' stroke='LightSkyBlue' ></line><line x1='100' y1='30' x2='100' y2='70' stroke-width='2' marker-end='url(#arrow)' marker-start='url(#dot)' stroke='LightSkyBlue' ></line><line x1='130' y1='30' x2='130' y2='70' stroke-width='2' marker-end='url(#arrow)' marker-start='url(#arrow)' stroke='LightSkyBlue' ></line></svg>
questions.explanation: The figure with one endpoint and one arrow represents a ray.

questions.question: Two lines can intersect at
questions.svg_content: <svg width='400' height='200' viewBox='0 0 400 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><g transform='translate(50, 80)'><line x1='-25' y1='0' x2='25' y1='0' stroke='#FF5252' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='0' y1='-25' x2='0' y1='25' stroke='#FF5252' stroke-width='3'/></g><g transform='translate(200, 80)'><line x1='-30' y1='-15' x2='30' y2='-15' stroke='#4285F4' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='-30' y1='15' x2='30' y2='15' stroke='#4285F4' stroke-width='3'/></g><g transform='translate(350, 80)'><line x1='-25' y1='-20' x2='25' y1='20' stroke='#0F9D58' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='-25' y1='20' x2='25' y1='-20' stroke='#0F9D58' stroke-width='3'/></g></svg>
questions.explanation: A line segment is part of a line between two points.

questions.question: Two lines that do not intersect are
Angle between two perpendicular lines is:
questions.svg_content: <svg width='400' height='200' viewBox='0 0 400 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><line x1='140' y1='60' x2='140' y2='110' stroke='#FF5252' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='120' y1='110' x2='160' y2='110' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='200' y1='60' x2='200' y2='110' stroke='Teal' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='199' y1='110' x2='240' y2='110' stroke='Teal' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='260' y1='60' x2='260' y2='110' stroke='Navy' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='259' y1='85' x2='300' y2='85' stroke='Navy' stroke-width='3'/></svg>
questions.explanation: Perpendicular lines always cross at 90° right angles.

questions.question: Which pair of lines is perpendicular?
questions.svg_content: <svg width='400' height='200' viewBox='0 0 400 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><text x='38' y='30' fill='Black'>1</text><text x='95' y='30' fill='Black'>2</text><text x='150' y='30' fill='Black'>3</text><text x='205' y='30' fill='Black'>4</text><text x='260' y='30' fill='Black'>5</text><line x1='40' y1='60' x2='40' y2='110' stroke='#FF5252' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='20' y1='110' x2='60' y2='110' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='80' y1='90' x2='120' y2='90' stroke='Navy' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='80' y1='110' x2='120' y2='110' stroke='Navy' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='140' y1='90' x2='180' y2='100' stroke='SlateGrey' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='140' y1='110' x2='180' y2='100' stroke='SlateGrey' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='200' y1='60' x2='200' y2='110' stroke='Teal' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='199' y1='110' x2='240' y2='110' stroke='Teal' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='260' y1='60' x2='260' y2='110' stroke='Navy' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='259' y1='85' x2='300' y2='85' stroke='Navy' stroke-width='3'/></svg>
questions.explanation: The first pair forms perfect right angles (90°).

questions.question: Which pair of lines is parallel?
questions.svg_content: <svg width='400' height='200' viewBox='0 0 400 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><text x='38' y='30' fill='Black'>1</text><text x='95' y='30' fill='Black'>2</text><text x='150' y='30' fill='Black'>3</text><text x='205' y='30' fill='Black'>4</text><text x='260' y='30' fill='Black'>5</text><line x1='40' y1='60' x2='40' y2='110' stroke='#FF5252' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='20' y1='110' x2='60' y2='110' stroke='black' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='80' y1='90' x2='120' y2='90' stroke='Navy' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='80' y1='110' x2='120' y2='110' stroke='Navy' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='140' y1='90' x2='180' y2='100' stroke='SlateGrey' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='140' y1='110' x2='180' y2='100' stroke='SlateGrey' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='200' y1='60' x2='200' y2='110' stroke='#FF5252' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='220' y1='60' x2='220' y2='110' stroke='#FF5252' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='260' y1='60' x2='260' y2='110' stroke='Navy' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='259' y1='85' x2='300' y2='85' stroke='Navy' stroke-width='3'/></svg>
questions.explanation: The first pair forms perfect right angles (90°).

questions.question: How many lines pass through 1 point?
questions.svg_content: <svg width='200' height='200' viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='7' fill='Navy'/><line x1='100' y1='100' x2='180' y2='100' stroke='RoyalBlue' stroke-width='2'/><line x1='100' y1='100' x2='140' y2='40' stroke='RoyalBlue' stroke-width='2'/><line x1='100' y1='100' x2='60' y2='40' stroke='RoyalBlue' stroke-width='2'/><line x1='100' y1='100' x2='20' y2='100' stroke='RoyalBlue' stroke-width='2'/><line x1='100' y1='100' x2='60' y2='160' stroke='RoyalBlue' stroke-width='2'/><line x1='100' y1='100' x2='140' y2='160' stroke='RoyalBlue' stroke-width='2'/></svg>
questions.explanation: The first pair forms perfect right angles (90°).

questions.question: How many lines pass through 2 points?
questions.explanation: The first pair forms perfect right angles (90°).

questions.question: Which of the following has definite(fixed) length?
questions.svg_content: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 100'><defs><marker id='arrow' viewBox='0 0 10 10' refX='5' refY='5' markerWidth='6' markerHeight='6' orient='auto-start-reverse'><path d='M 0 0 L 10 5 L 0 10 z' fill='LightSkyBlue'></path></marker><marker id='dot' markerWidth='5' markerHeight='5' refX='2.5' refY='2.5' orient='auto'><circle cx='2.5' cy='2.5' r='2.5' fill='LightSkyBlue'></circle></marker></defs><line x1='70' y1='30' x2='70' y2='70' stroke-width='2' marker-end='url(#dot)' marker-start='url(#dot)' stroke='LightSkyBlue' ></line><line x1='100' y1='30' x2='100' y2='70' stroke-width='2' marker-end='url(#arrow)' marker-start='url(#dot)' stroke='LightSkyBlue' ></line><line x1='130' y1='30' x2='130' y2='70' stroke-width='2' marker-end='url(#arrow)' marker-start='url(#arrow)' stroke='LightSkyBlue' ></line></svg>
questions.explanation: A line segment is part of a line between two points.

questions.question: line can extend?
questions.svg_content: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 100'><defs><marker id='arrow' viewBox='0 0 10 10' refX='5' refY='5' markerWidth='6' markerHeight='6' orient='auto-start-reverse'><path d='M 0 0 L 10 5 L 0 10 z' fill='LightSkyBlue'></path></marker><marker id='dot' markerWidth='5' markerHeight='5' refX='2.5' refY='2.5' orient='auto'><circle cx='2.5' cy='2.5' r='2.5' fill='LightSkyBlue'></circle></marker></defs><line x1='70' y1='30' x2='70' y2='70' stroke-width='2' marker-end='url(#dot)' marker-start='url(#dot)' stroke='LightSkyBlue' ></line><line x1='100' y1='30' x2='100' y2='70' stroke-width='2' marker-end='url(#arrow)' marker-start='url(#dot)' stroke='LightSkyBlue' ></line><line x1='130' y1='30' x2='130' y2='70' stroke-width='2' marker-end='url(#arrow)' marker-start='url(#arrow)' stroke='LightSkyBlue' ></line></svg>
questions.explanation: A line segment is part of a line between two points.

questions.question: Difference between line segment, ray and line  ____.
Which of the following points lie on exactly 1 line segments?
questions.svg_content: <svg viewBox='0 0 130 130' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><style>.label { font-size: 8px; fill: black; text-anchor: middle; }</style><circle cx='20' cy='60' fill= 'red' r='2'/><text x='20' y='55' class='label'>L</text><line x1='20' y1='60' x2='38.7939' y2='53.1596' stroke= 'red'/><circle cx='38.7939' cy='53.1596' fill= 'red' r='2'/><text x='38.7939' y='48.1596' class='label'>M</text><line x1='38.7939' y1='53.1596' x2='57.5878' y2='60.0000' stroke= 'blue'/><circle cx='57.5878' cy='60.0000' fill= 'red' r='2'/><text x='57.5878' y='55.0000' class='label'>P</text><line x1='57.5878' y1='60.0000' x2='77.5878' y2='60.0000' stroke= 'red'/><circle cx='77.5878' cy='60.0000' fill= 'red' r='2'/><text x='77.5878' y='55.0000' class='label'>Q</text><line x1='77.5878' y1='60.0000' x2='92.8920' y2='72.8564' stroke= 'blue'/><circle cx='92.8920' cy='72.8564' fill= 'red' r='2'/><text x='92.8920' y='67.8564' class='label'>R</text></svg>
questions.explanation: A line segment is part of a line between two points.

questions.question: Which of the following points lie on exactly 2 line segments?
questions.svg_content: <svg viewBox='0 0 130 130' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><style>.label { font-size: 8px; fill: black; text-anchor: middle; }</style><circle cx='20' cy='60' fill= 'red' r='2'/><text x='20' y='55' class='label'>L</text><line x1='20' y1='60' x2='38.7939' y2='53.1596' stroke= 'red'/><circle cx='38.7939' cy='53.1596' fill= 'red' r='2'/><text x='38.7939' y='48.1596' class='label'>M</text><line x1='38.7939' y1='53.1596' x2='57.5878' y2='60.0000' stroke= 'blue'/><circle cx='57.5878' cy='60.0000' fill= 'red' r='2'/><text x='57.5878' y='55.0000' class='label'>P</text><line x1='57.5878' y1='60.0000' x2='77.5878' y2='60.0000' stroke= 'red'/><circle cx='77.5878' cy='60.0000' fill= 'red' r='2'/><text x='77.5878' y='55.0000' class='label'>Q</text><line x1='77.5878' y1='60.0000' x2='92.8920' y2='72.8564' stroke= 'blue'/><circle cx='92.8920' cy='72.8564' fill= 'red' r='2'/><text x='92.8920' y='67.8564' class='label'>R</text></svg>
questions.explanation: A line segment is part of a line between two points.
